Detailed Description

==== CaliceEcalHitInfo Processor ====

Collect Calice ECAL reconstructed hits information and store these informations into a ROOT Tree. This works with Calice TB data and also Simulated data

Parameters:
CaloHitColName: Name of the input Particle collection
ROOTFileName: Name of the output ROOT file
MiniHits: Mini number of hits
HitType: Type of the Hits : Sim or Reco
Author:
Hengne Li, LAL & Philippe Doublet, LAL
Version:
Id
